MRA 1 transfer question...
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): MRA 1 transfer question...
By Anonymous on Friday, June 16, 2006 - 08:17 am:

can monsters that existed in MRA (but not in MRA2) be transferred to MRA2 via link cable? if so, are they listed in the MRA2 monster book when they get there?

By Lisa Shock on Friday, June 16, 2006 - 07:39 pm:

Yes, IIRC, they get listed as the purebreed type in MRA2 -if you are referring to rares like Diva.

By Anonymous on Saturday, June 17, 2006 - 07:47 am:

i meant monsters like moon light and ninja (antlan/sp from MRA), for example...will those work?

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, June 17, 2006 - 07:54 pm:

I think they transfer as the pure type, and IIRC they transfer in as babies.
